page.title: 10THE FITTING OF EYE CH. BELLS
page.content: From April to May 1985 the bells at Eye Church were refitted into their new frames.The actual cost of the bells being repaired was Â£8,100 and fund raising events managed to raise Â£10,000.In June 1985 the bells were rededicated by the{Bishop of Ludlow. There are 6 bells and these are: Treble Bell,note F#,says Prosperity to this parish. William Evans 1756. 2nd,note E,says All praise and glory be to +God+ 1831. 3rd,note D,says This peal was recast by John Taylor & Co Oxford 1831. 4th,note C#,says The Hon'ble Henry Rodney vicar 1831. 5th,note B,says William Thomas Esqr: Thos:Yeats Church Wardens 1831. Tenor,note A,says John Taylor & Co founders of the city of Oxford and near Bidford Devon 1831.
